CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0xad977b3458779cb27b2066be30b84d5b5ddf5a8a.sol#628-656) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0xad977b3458779cb27b2066be30b84d5b5ddf5a8a.sol#642-656)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0xad977b3458779cb27b2066be30b84d5b5ddf5a8a.sol#641-656)

CrowdsaleBase.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xad977b3458779cb27b2066be30b84d5b5ddf5a8a.sol#296-298)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xad977b3458779cb27b2066be30b84d5b5ddf5a8a.sol#164-165)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xad977b3458779cb27b2066be30b84d5b5ddf5a8a.sol#194)
